content: **jacket for baby with round yoke and textured pattern knitted top down shorts for baby with ties and rib piece is knitted in drops baby merino size premature to 2 years** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the stroll in the park shorts pattern here 1 see the stroll in the park hat pattern here 2 see the stroll in the park booties pattern here 3 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no bm-105-by yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- ***for the entire set *** **size** jacket <0 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 years size equals approx kid s height in inches 1ft4/1ft5 1ft7/1ft8 1ft 10/2ft 2ft3/2ft5 2ft7/2ft9 3ft size equals approx kid s height in cm 40/44 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 shorts <0 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 years size equals approx kid s height in inches 1ft4/1ft5 1ft7/1ft8 1ft 10/2ft 2ft3/2ft5 2ft7/2ft9 3ft size equals approx kid s height in cm 40/44 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 **materials** drops babymerino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150 150-200-200-250 250 g color 11 ice blue or drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150 150-200-200-250 250 g colour 9026 blush ---------------------------------------------------------- ***jacket*** **size** <0 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 years size equals approx kid s height in inches 1ft4/1ft5 1ft7/1ft8 1ft 10/2ft 2ft3/2ft5 2ft7/2ft9 3ft size equals approx kid s height in cm 40/44 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 finished measurements chest measurements 36-42-48-52-56-60 cm = 14 1/4 -16 1/2 -19 -20 1/2 -22 -23 5/8 full length 20-24-28-30-33-36 cm = 8 -9 1/2 -11 -11 3/4 -13 -14 1/4 all measurements in chart are in cm **materials** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100 100-100-150-150 150 g color 11 ice blue or use drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100 100-100-150-150 150 g colour 9026 blush **knitting gauge ** 24 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stockinette stitch = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 needles drops circular needle size 3 mm = us 2 5 length 60 cm = 24 drops double pointed needles size 3 mm = us 2 5 drops circular needle size 2 5 mm = us 1 5 length 60 cm = 24 for edges in garter stitch drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm = us 1 5 needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to smaller needles drops mother-of-pearl button arched white no 515 5 pieces for all sizes ---------------------------------------------------------- 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b33-26-b-stroll-in-the-park-shorts 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b33-25-stroll-in-the-park-hat 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b33-27-stroll-in-the-park-booties
